headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NISLEY, JANESSA C.

lead_paragraph: NISLEY--Janessa C.,age 69, died peacefully at her home in Hudson, NY on February 27, 2014. Her husband Professor Jay Carlisle was at her side. Janessa was an honors graduate of Vasser College and Fordham Law School. She argued hundreds of appeals as Chief of the Special Litigation Bureau for The New York City offices of Housing Preservation and Development. She was a Past President of the Brooklyn Chapter Civil Liberties Union and a Director for 20 years of the South Brooklyn Legal Services Corp. She is survived by her husband and step-daughter Marie Carlisle, brothers Robert Martin and Jack Nisley, sister Rebecca Nisley and several nieces and nephews. A memorial service will be held at a later date.
